mainText:
RIP Steve Jobs. Thank you for all the formidable things you gave me, from my
 first Apple II computer to the iPad 2 that I am using to write this message
... And thank you for everything else that is still to come and that will make me wonder "how did I ever live without this?"

GENIUSES LEAVE LEGACIES THAT CHANGE OUR EVERYDAY LIVES AND THAT IS EXACTLY WHAT YOU DID!

Thank you
author: Vania
